myfoodora

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • myfoodora.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Each restaurant stores the proposed dishes in a menu. It also stores the proposed pre-defined meals.
    See Also:
